sentences.en: For holidays, I prefer the relative seclusion of the countryside.
sentences.cn: 度假的时候, 我较喜欢乡间相对的幽静.

sentences.en: He came out of his seclusion, renewed relations with his friends.
sentences.cn: 他从他那蛰居之处走出来, 与朋友们重新交往.

sentences.en: I live very much in seclusion these days.
sentences.cn: 这些天我过着几乎与世隔绝的生活.

sentences.en: I mean from henceforth to lead a life of extreme seclusion.
sentences.cn: 我决定从今天起将过一种完全与世隔绝的生活.

sentences.en: In spite of the extremity of her seclusion she was sane.
sentences.cn: 尽管完全与世隔绝，她依然心智健全。

sentences.en: It is a mile or two from the Pyramids, and surrounded by woods affording complete seclusion.
sentences.cn: 它距金字塔一两哩, 四面都是树林,完全与外界隔离.

sentences.en: Kennicott slowly understood that she meant to keep up her seclusion.
sentences.cn: 肯尼科特慢慢地开始懂得,她是有意要回避他.

sentences.en: Of the 28 hospitals that changed their policies to become smoke free, tobacco-related health problems, seclusion and restraint, and use of coercion or threats all declined significantly, they said.
sentences.cn: 研究人员说，这28家医院采取了禁烟政策以后，因香烟引起的健康问题以及隔离，限制，强迫或者威胁的使用次数，都有显著地下降。

sentences.en: She left the seclusion of Knocktarlitie with tears of sincere affection.
sentences.cn: 她带着深情的泪水离开了诺克塔利脱的僻静之乡.

sentences.en: She liked to sunbathe in the seclusion of her own garden.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢在自己僻静的花园里晒日光浴.

sentences.en: She lives in seclusion apart from her friends.
sentences.cn: 她远离朋友,过着隐居生活.

sentences.en: The famous actor now lives in seclusion.
sentences.cn: 那位著名的演员现在过着隐居生活.

sentences.en: the seclusion and peace of the island
They enjoyed ten days of peace and seclusion.
sentences.cn: 他们享受了十天与世隔绝的宁静生活。

sentences.en: They love the seclusion of their garden.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢自家花园的幽静。

sentences.en: We are now in rural seclusion.
sentences.cn: 我们目前过着乡村隐居生活.

trans.tran_en: the state of being private and away from other people
